data.title: Virgin Media or Mobile down? Current problems and issues |
data.meta_description: Real-time Virgin Media status, problems and issues. Internet, mobile or cable tv down? We'll tell you what is going on.
data.text:
Nova An hour gone by without internet. VM, what's going on?

Nova WiFi totally down here. Having to use data right now.

Dawn My broadband is down fy3 area

David Cook Virgin landline down all day. No availability of 150 mobile contact no. or O345 454111. Qr code also says webpage down. No ability to contact a human. System says there are no known problems. Well now

Ryan Kennedy At least they are telling us there are problems tonight but once again my net is down, then again I have heard of some problems across multiple networks recently

Si Brown ASHFORD, Kent down again. 2nd time this week.

kiran kara Kings heath down again. upgraded to gigabit and haven't seen that speed for more than a minute since getting it. I've got worse speeds than before my upgrade they are denying it's a

Steve Chapman No broadband or TV in Epping, Essex all day so far

Not_A_Weirdo Birmingham Central-West down again. After being down for 2 weeks recently & denying my auto - comp w/o reason (really bcuz they didnâ€™t wanna pay my entire street) Ive got ZERO faith left in VM

Jamie The H Botley, hedge end areas Internet has gone down yet again.. going on at least once a week now

Nick Sargeant Lost Virgin Media internet in Southampton a couple of hours ago - maybe 90 minutes? My laptop and other devices are on Toob - we decided that we needed a backup internet service for the home a couple

disqus_AAMnXJquEV This getting crazy since they changed over..what they said is new speeds..for last month no Internet..i might have too change providers...if they cant provide me with constant Internet

Nick no Internet in tameside. anyone else

George Anyone in Telford experiencing issues at this time? Internet keeps going down and up all the time

Ed Alder I can't access my emails. If I had important communications to respond to, I would be in trouble. Infinite spinning loop !
